attributes.action: Admit that he will not pay any attention to any suggestion that does not fit his narrow vision for the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition system is just a sham exercise to make anyone interested in the direction of policy in this country to indulge themselves in the myth of 'The Big Conversation' when in fact the Government will ignore people's opinions when they do not fit with existing Government policy.

The petitions section of this website should be fitted with a banner that reads 'you do not matter to us!'

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
